title: John Deere 7020 4WD Tractor
item_description:
John Deere 7020 4WD Tractor

  • Manufacturer: John Deere
  • Model: 7020
  • Tractor Type: Tractor
  • Hours: 3684
  • Number of Tires: 8
  • Tire Size: 18.4-34
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Engine: John Deere 6.6L 6-cyl diesel engine
  • Unit is operational, drives forward and back (see video) and has operational PTO (see video). Unit does not have the ability to turn left or right. 
  • Link to Tractor Data page for this model: https://www.tractordata.com/farm-tractors/000/0/7/76-john-deere-7020.html

CARB Off-Road Diesel Disclosure Statement: “When operated in California, any off-road diesel vehicle may be subject to the California Air Resources Board In-Use Off-road Diesel Vehicle Regulation. It therefore could be subject to retrofit or accelerated turnover requirements to reduce emissions of air pollutants. For more information, please visit the California Air Resources Board website at http://www.arb.ca.gov/msprog/ordiesel/ordiesel.htm.”
